item.title: About Me
item.description: Born in 1990. Living in Ukraine. Could have become a mathematician and gone abroad (was in the IMO 2007). Toward the end of school (2006–2007), I fell into a negative psychological state that lasted for many years (stayed at home, did nothing, and felt awful). I don’t know what it was, how such a thing is even possible, or why it happened to me. Now, I am ‘in a deep hole’ (not psychologically, but practically).
